verses.verse: <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%> Set me on <S%H7682>high<s%> from those who rise up against <S%H6965>me.<s%>
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity.<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me from the <S%H1818>bloodthirsty<s%> <S%H582>men.<s%>

<S%H693>For,<s%> behold, they lie in wait for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> The <S%H5794>mighty<s%> <S%H1481>gather<s%> themselves together against <S%H6588>me,<s%> not for my disobedience, nor for my <S%H2403>sin,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
I have done no <S%H5771>wrong,<s%> yet they are <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H7323>attack<s%> <S%H5782>me.<s%> Rise <S%H7200>up,<s%> behold, and help <S%H7125>me!<s%>

<S%H3068>You,<s%> Yahweh <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6974>rouse<s%> yourself to <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> Show no <S%H2603>mercy<s%> to the <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H898>traitors.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
They <S%H7725>return<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> <S%H1993>howling<s%> like <S%H3611>dogs,<s%> and prowl <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
<S%H5042>Behold,<s%> they spew with their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> <S%H2719>Swords<s%> are in their <S%H8193>lips,<s%> <S%H8085>"For,<s%>" they say, "who hears us?"
But <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H7832>laugh<s%> at <S%H3932>them.<s%> You scoff at all the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
<S%H5797>Oh,<s%> my Strength, I <S%H8104>watch<s%> for <S%H430>you,<s%> for God is my high <S%H4869>tower.<s%>
My <S%H430>God<s%> will go <S%H6923>before<s%> me with his loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will let me <S%H7200>look<s%> at my enemies in <S%H8324>triumph.<s%>

<S%H2026>Don't<s%> kill <S%H5971>them,<s%> or my people may <S%H7911>forget.<s%> <S%H5128>Scatter<s%> them by your <S%H2428>power,<s%> and bring them <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> our <S%H4043>shield.<s%>

For the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of their <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of their <S%H8193>lips,<s%> let them be <S%H3920>caught<s%> in their <S%H1347>pride,<s%> for the <S%H423>curses<s%> and <S%H3585>lies<s%> which they <S%H5608>utter.<s%>

<S%H3615>Consume<s%> them in <S%H2534>wrath.<s%> <S%H3615>Consume<s%> <S%H3045>them,<s%> and they will be no more. Let them know that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4910>rules<s%> in <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
At <S%H6153>evening<s%> let them <S%H7725>return.<s%> Let them <S%H1993>howl<s%> like a <S%H3611>dog,<s%> and go <S%H5437>around<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>
They shall wander up and <S%H5128>down<s%> for <S%H398>food,<s%> and <S%H3885>wait<s%> all night if they <S%H7646>aren't<s%> satisfied.

But I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> of your <S%H5797>strength.<s%> <S%H7442>Yes,<s%> I will sing aloud of your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning.<s%> For you have been my high <S%H4869>tower,<s%> a <S%H4498>refuge<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6862>distress.<s%>
To <S%H5797>you,<s%> my strength, I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H430>praises.<s%> For God is my high <S%H4869>tower,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H2617>mercy.<s%>
